categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A Nosaurian Padawan studied with the Jedi Order during its formative in the centuries following the Force Wars and the abandonment of Tython.

A Force-sensitive Nosaurian was identified as Force-sensitive and began training in the ways of the Force with the Jedi Order circa 25,000 BBY. Stationed at a camp with several other Jedi, the Nosaurian sat around a campfire with fellow apprentices Cope Shykrill, a Human, and a Fian. While listening to a shadow play by Shykrill, the Selonian apprentice called upon the dark side of the Force to send him into a rage and slaughter the Fian and the Human. He injured Shykrill as part of the Selonian's attempt to cast suspicion onto the Nosaurian, who slit his own throat after exclaiming that the shadows were in his head. While Shykrill hoped to be free of blame, Jedi Masters Sar Agorn and Nuck Lyu saw through the ruse and killed the dark sider.
